original_text:
Kongo Bongo
Informazioni generali
Software: Tom Horn
Rulli: 3
Linee di gioco: 1
Puntata minima: 1 gettone
Puntata massima: 100 gettoni
Vincita massima: 80.000 gettoni
Return To Player (RTP): 96,07%
Autoplay: Si
Caratteristiche principali
Kongo Bongo è una slot machine della software house Tom Horn Gaming, che ci porta nel bel mezzo della giungla in compagnia di un grosso scimmione che detiene lo scettro di re delle Banane.
È una slot caratterizzata dalla presenza di soli tre rulli anziché i canonici cinque, e da un’unica linea di pagamento attiva.
La particolarità di questo gioco è data dalla volatilità variabile, il che significa che le possibilità di ottenere una vincita non sono prestabilite ma cambiano a seconda del valore della puntata: più scommettete, più possibilità avrete di vincere!
Questa peculiarità rende Kongo Bongo un gioco adatto più ai giocatori navigati ed esperti: per vincere qui dovrete essere disposti a effettuare delle puntate di un certo valore, per cui se non ve la sentite o apprezzate maggiormente le slot “a basso investimento”, questa non fa decisamente per voi!
Grafica, simboli e loro valore
La grafica di Kongo Bongo è molto ben curata: il tema della giungla è sviluppato in modo coerente e affascinante con banani e altri alberi che fanno da cornice alle vicende del re scimmione.
Tra i simboli presenti in questa slot machine troverete:

Il simbolo Bar: paga fino a trenta volte la puntata
Delle banane: se compaiono su tutti i tre rulli pagano 50 volte la puntata,
La batteria suonata da Kongo Bongo: la presenza di questo simbolo sui tre rulli paga tra 100 e 150 volte la puntata a seconda del valore della scommessa.
Lucky 7’s: simbolo che richiama la tradizione delle vecchie slot machine terrestri, vale tra 200x e 400x la puntata.
Le stelle dorate: hanno un valore che va da 500 a 800 volte la puntata.

Kongo Bongo: conclusioni
Kongo Bongo, il re delle banane, vestito con una giacca viola e con un medaglione d’oro al collo, tiene d’occhio i giocatori mentre girano i rulli e offre loro supporto e consigli!
Questa slot machine di casa Tom Horn, non ha molte funzionalità speciali o una modalità di gioco particolarmente complicata, il che la rende adatta anche ai giocatori che si affacciano per la prima volta al mondo delle slot, ma che ambiscono ad ottenere delle vincite consistenti.
Allo stesso tempo però, la volatilità variabile a seconda del valore della scommessa rende Kongo Bongo un gioco attraente anche per coloro che desiderano scommettere alte cifre.
Questa slot machine offre anche una funzionalità speciale a cui si accede quando sui rulli compare il Boss delle scimmie e che permette di ottenere dei giri gratuiti!
È una slot machine con una grafica di alta qualità che può essere giocata senza perdere le sue caratteristiche grafiche non solo da computer ma anche in versione desktop.

raw_translation.response:
Kongo Bongo
General Information
Software: Tom Horn
Reels: 3
Paylines: 1
Minimum bet: 1 coin
Maximum bet: 100 coins
Maximum payout: 80,000 coins
Return To Player (RTP): 96.07%
Autoplay: Yes
Key Features
Kongo Bongo is a slot machine developed by Tom Horn Gaming. This game takes place in the heart of the jungle with a giant monkey who holds the scepter of the Banana King.
Unlike most slots, Kongo Bongo only has three reels and one active payline. The unique feature of this game is its variable volatility, meaning the chances of winning vary depending on the amount of the bet placed. The more you bet, the higher your chances of winning!
This feature makes Kongo Bongo ideal for experienced and savvy players. To win, you must bet big. If you prefer low-stake slots, this game is not for you!
Graphics, symbols and their value
The graphics of Kongo Bongo are top-notch. The jungle theme is captivating, with bananas and other trees framing the monkey king's story. The symbols in this slot machine include:
- The Bar symbol pays up to thirty times the bet
- Bananas pay 50 times the bet if they appear on all three reels
- The Kongo Bongo drum pays between 100 and 150 times the bet depending on the value of the bet placed
- Lucky 7s are present, paying between 200x and 400x the bet
- Golden stars are valued between 500 and 800 times the bet
Kongo Bongo: Final Thoughts
Kongo Bongo, the banana king, dressed in a purple jacket and an over-sized gold medal, keeps an eye on players as they spin the reels and offers support and advice!
This slot machine from Tom Horn doesn't have many special features or a particularly complicated gameplay, making it suitable even for new players. However, the variable volatility based on the value of the bet placed attracts those who desire to bet big.
This high-quality slot machine even features a special function accessed when the monkey boss appears on the reels, allowing you to win free spins! Kongo Bongo can be played on both desktop and computer without losing its stunning graphics.

raw_translation.response:
Kongo Bongo: A Review for Experienced Gamblers

Looking for an exciting adventure in the jungle? Look no further than Kongo Bongo, the latest slot game from Tom Horn Gaming! With three reels, one active payline, and a maximum bet of 100 coins, this game offers a maximum payout of 80,000 coins and a Return to Player (RTP) of 96.07%.

But what really makes Kongo Bongo stand out from other slot games is its variable volatility - meaning that your chances of winning are not predetermined, but change based on the value of your bet. This makes Kongo Bongo a game for seasoned and experienced players who are willing to make high bets to win big. If you prefer low investment slots, this game is not for you.

The graphics in Kongo Bongo are stunning, with a jungle theme and symbols such as bananas, a Bar symbol, Kongo Bongo's drum, Lucky 7’s, and golden stars. The King himself, dressed in a purple jacket and an gold medallion, watches as you spin the reels, offering support and advice.

While Kongo Bongo doesn't have many special features or complicated gameplay, it is well-suited for both newbie and experienced players looking for consistent big wins. The variable volatility makes it attractive for high rollers, and there is even a special free spins feature when the Boss Monkey appears on the reels.

Overall, Kongo Bongo is a high-quality game that can be enjoyed on both desktop and mobile devices without sacrificing its graphics quality. So, are you ready to join Kongo Bongo and become the King of Bananas? Place your bets and hit the spin button now!

Maximum bet: 100 coins
Maximum payout: 80,000 coins
Return To Player (RTP): 96.07%
Autoplay: Yes
Key Features
Kongo Bongo is a slot machine developed by Tom Horn Gaming. This game takes place in the heart of the jungle with a giant monkey who holds the scepter of the Banana King.
Unlike most slots, Kongo Bongo only has three reels and one active payline. The unique feature of this game is its variable volatility, meaning the chances of winning vary depending on the amount of the bet placed. The more you bet, the higher your chances of winning!
This feature makes Kongo Bongo ideal for experienced and savvy players. To win, you must bet big. If you prefer low-stake slots, this game is not for you!
Graphics, symbols and their value
The graphics of Kongo Bongo are top-notch. The jungle theme is captivating, with bananas and other trees framing the monkey king's story. The symbols in this slot machine include:
- The Bar symbol pays up to thirty times the bet
- Bananas pay 50 times the bet if they appear on all three reels
- The Kongo Bongo drum pays between 100 and 150 times the bet depending on the value of the bet placed
- Lucky 7s are present, paying between 200x and 400x the bet
- Golden stars are valued between 500 and 800 times the bet
Kongo Bongo: Final Thoughts
Kongo Bongo, the banana king, dressed in a purple jacket and an over-sized gold medal, keeps an eye on players as they spin the reels and offers support and advice!
This slot machine from Tom Horn doesn't have many special features or a particularly complicated gameplay, making it suitable even for new players. However, the variable volatility based on the value of the bet placed attracts those who desire to bet big.
This high-quality slot machine even features a special function accessed when the monkey boss appears on the reels, allowing you to win free spins! Kongo Bongo can be played on both desktop and computer without losing its stunning graphics.

Kongo Bongo's variable volatility and the requirement to bet big make it best suited to experienced players who are willing to take risks in order to increase their chances of winning. This game is not recommended for low-stake players who prefer smaller bets and more frequent, smaller payouts.

General Information

Key Features
Kongo Bongo is a slot machine developed by Tom Horn Gaming. This game takes place in the heart of the jungle with a giant monkey who holds the scepter of the Banana King.
Unlike most slots, Kongo Bongo only has three reels and one active payline. The unique feature of this game is its variable volatility, meaning the chances of winning vary depending on the amount of the bet placed. The more you bet, the higher your chances of winning!
This feature makes Kongo Bongo ideal for experienced and savvy players. To win, you must bet big. If you prefer low-stake slots, this game is not for you!
Graphics, symbols and their value
The graphics of Kongo Bongo are top-notch. The jungle theme is captivating, with bananas and other trees framing the monkey king's story. The symbols in this slot machine include:
- The Bar symbol pays up to thirty times the bet
- Bananas pay 50 times the bet if they appear on all three reels
- The Kongo Bongo drum pays between 100 and 150 times the bet depending on the value of the bet placed
- Lucky 7s are present, paying between 200x and 400x the bet
- Golden stars are valued between 500 and 800 times the bet

Kongo Bongo, the banana king, dressed in a purple jacket and an over-sized gold medal, keeps an eye on players as they spin the reels and offers support and advice!
This slot machine from Tom Horn doesn't have many special features or a particularly complicated gameplay, making it suitable even for new players. However, the variable volatility based on the value of the bet placed attracts those who desire to bet big.
